channel.title: Core 732 [Squeal/Pouch] [UPDATED/New Kiln Cape]
channel.description:
[center]
[size=18pt]Client Click and Play! [url=http://play-core.net76.net/]http://play-core.net76.net/[/url][/size]
Information about the server: Core is a 719 loading 732 Rsps, this is a economy server with pvm/pvp and fun! The staff spot is currently open, so if you want to apply meet in-game!
Join Today
Full Godwars -Bandos -Kree'ara -Saradomin -Zamorak Dicing -Horse dicing -Seal dicing -Flower game All Caves -Forinth cave (revenants working with drops!) -Falador cave -More, cannot remember Duel Arena Agility -Wilderness agility -Gnome agility -Feldip Hills Tormented demons -Now fixed prayer! Barrows -Fixed chest loot! Dominion Tower -Working prizes! -Fixed Corporal Beast Fight Pits Fight Kiln -Currently being worked on, almost done! Fight Caves -Working all waves! Queen Black Dragon -Fully working, fixed some bugs! Trivia -Custom minigame Castle Wars -Fully working, c Clan Wars -Dangerous and safe working, even the purple portal now! Kalphite Queen -Fixed drop rate Jadinko's -Added cave and npc's + bonusses and drops! Glacors -Now dropping faster dragon boots, but a bit more attack bonus! All 23/24 Skills working -Dungeoneering is being worked on, it is going to be released very soon!
This is not everything, we are a amazing economy based server with allot of shops! Admin spot and moderator spot is currently open, also looking for good advertisers so we can get more players and have more fun!
Media Time!
(Allot)

item.title: Core 732 [Squeal/Pouch] [UPDATED/New Kiln Cape]
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

[quote=“vyre-scape, post:7, topic:460295”]To the guys who think their “cool”.
RSPS Servers (DOESN’T DEPEND ON THE REVISION) are meant FOR FUN! Just to play an easy version of RuneScape, maybe even join a huge community

Don’t judge the revisions, If you don’t like - don’t comment.

OT: Good luck with your server, yet your features are same as Matrix’s.[/quote]

I agree with you, but i still like the new item’s!

Thanks.
Those are my old pictures, the updates we’ve done are FAR more than what you can see.

Read full topic

item.title: Core 732 [Squeal/Pouch] [UPDATED/New Kiln Cape]
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

[center]

[size=18pt]Client Click and Play!
http://play-core.net76.net/[/size]

Information about the server:
Core is a 719 loading 732 Rsps, this is a economy server with pvm/pvp and fun!
The staff spot is currently open, so if you want to apply meet in-game!

Join Today

Full Godwars
-Bandos
-Kree’ara
-Saradomin
-Zamorak
Dicing
-Horse dicing
-Seal dicing
-Flower game
All Caves
-Forinth cave (revenants working with drops!)
-Falador cave
-More, cannot remember
Duel Arena
Agility
-Wilderness agility
-Gnome agility
-Feldip Hills
Tormented demons
-Now fixed prayer!
Barrows
-Fixed chest loot!
Dominion Tower
-Working prizes!
-Fixed Corporal Beast
Fight Pits
Fight Kiln
-Currently being worked on, almost done!
Fight Caves
-Working all waves!
Queen Black Dragon
-Fully working, fixed some bugs!
Trivia
-Custom minigame
Castle Wars
-Fully working, c
Clan Wars
-Dangerous and safe working, even the purple portal now!
Kalphite Queen
-Fixed drop rate
Jadinko’s
-Added cave and npc’s + bonusses and drops!
Glacors
-Now dropping faster dragon boots, but a bit more attack bonus!
All 23/24 Skills working
-Dungeoneering is being worked on, it is going to be released very soon!

This is not everything, we are a amazing economy based server with allot of shops!
Admin spot and moderator spot is currently open,
also looking for good advertisers so we can get
more players and have more fun!

Media Time!

(Allot)

331q0i0.png758×497
[/center]

[size=18pt]Client Click and Play!
http://play-core.net76.net/[/size]
